name: Blades of Avernum
description:
The fourth role-playing game in the Avernum series. Create a party of four heroes, and set off to one of four scenarios:
The Valley of Dying: Explore the world of magic and sorcery and find the secret to the mysterious plague.
A Small Rebellion: A group of rebels formed against the empire, will you fight them or join them?
The Za-Khazi Run: Quest your way through a dangerous river and try to save your allies on the other side before time runs out.
Diplomacy With the Dead: Help a small city fight a powerful vampire.
